Name: Scarlet and Blank
About the game: In 1888 in Yoshiwara, the pleasure district of Tokyo, a man meets a woman. Soon after, the illustrious escort Hakuhi dies, her throat slit by a gilded silver hairpin. So begins a tale of the events leading up to her death, told from the perspective of one man who loves her and another who hates her more than life itself. ―　Award-winning Click-through Recitation Drama　― Winner of the gold medal in the Sound Novel category of the 14th Freem! Game Awards. Please be aware that as a sound novel, this game is like an illustrated drama CD. It has only one route and there are no choices to be made while reading. The main story includes a prologue and epilogue and is fully voiced. A bonus chapter which unlocks after clearing the main game is partly voiced. ―　Characters　― Takano Seiji. The second son of a noble family who finds himself at the White Horses brothel one night. Yaichi. A floor hand at the White Horses where Hakuhi works as an indentured escort. Hakuhi. The most popular escort at the White Horses, who can bend men to her will with a blink. Content Warning This game's story is a tragedy, and contains adult themes such as slavery, prostitution, bullying, depression, and suicide. It does not contain any explicit material.
